## Free for HRS guests in the hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso (Santo Stefano
di Sessanio)

  * Free WiFi
  * Bike rental

## Important information

### Style of hotel and ambience

Do you want to spend your holidays in Santo Stefano di Sessiano in a truly
unique ambience? Then, decide upon the hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso. Here,
guests spend their nights in traditional rooms with medieval charm.
Furnishings of the 17th century and antique fireplaces do one more thing. In
the restaurant, local dishes and home-grown products are served.

## Location of the hotel

The hotel is embedded into the medieval village amidst the Gran Sasso and
Monti della Laga National Park. Go on long hiking and biking tours and explore
the splendid region Abruzzo with its spectacular mountains. Perugia is located
150 kilometres away.

##  Frequently asked questions about Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso (Santo
Stefano...

###  Does Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso offer free WLAN in the room?

Free WLAN in the room is available to all Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso
guests.

###  Does Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso offer parking spaces for guests?

Guests of the Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso can use the following parking
options.

  * Hotel-owned car park

###  Can I have breakfast in Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso?

Yes in the Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso you can enjoy the breakfast offer.

###  How far is the nearest airport?

The nearest airport is 45 km from the hotel.

###  What are the advantages of booking the Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso
via HRS?

HRS customers receive the following benefits when they book the Hotel
Sextantio Albergo Diffuso:

  * Free WiFi
  * Bike rental

.

###  Is there a restaurant in the Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso?

The hotel has its own restaurant.

###  Is the hotel barrier-free?

Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso belongs to the barrier-free hotels in Santo
Stefano di Sessanio.

###  Are the hotel rooms equipped with air conditioning?

Unfortunately, the hotel rooms in the Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso do not
have their own air conditioning.

###  Is it possible to cancel my booking at the Hotel Sextantio Albergo
Diffuso free of charge?

With our Flex rate, HRS customers can always cancel their hotel bookings free
of charge before 6 pm on the check-in day.

###  When is the reception occupied?

At the Hotel Sextantio Albergo Diffuso the reception times are as follows:

  * During the week: 24 hours busy.
  * At weekends: 24 hours busy.

###  Which payment methods can I use to pay in Hotel Sextantio Albergo
Diffuso?

You can pay at the hotel with the following means of payment:

  * Mastercard
  * Visa
  * American Express

###  Can I collect miles and points during a trip?

With your myHRS account, you will earn miles & points with our partners 'Miles
& More', 'BahnBonus' every time you book a hotel. You will find more
information here..
